Uses of Package
org.cojen.tupl.repl

  • Packages that use org.cojen.tupl.repl 
    Package Description
    org.cojen.tupl
    See Database to get started with Tupl.
    org.cojen.tupl.repl
    General-purpose Raft-based replication system, intended for supporting fully replicated databases.
  • Classes in org.cojen.tupl.repl used by org.cojen.tupl 
    Class and Description
    ReplicatorConfig
    Configuration options used when opening a replicator.
  • Classes in org.cojen.tupl.repl used by org.cojen.tupl.repl 
    Class and Description
    DatabaseReplicator
    Implementation of a ReplicationManager for supporting full database replication.
    DirectReplicator
    Replicator interface for applications which directly control the replication data, and are also responsible for processing snapshots.
    DirectReplicator.Accessor
    Direct interface for accessing replication data, for a given term.
    DirectReplicator.Reader
    Direct interface for reading from a replicator, for a given term.
    DirectReplicator.Writer
    Direct interface for writing to a replicator, for a given term.
    MessageReplicator
    Message-oriented replication interface, which is a bit easier to use than StreamReplicator.
    MessageReplicator.Reader
    Interface called by any group member for reading committed messages.
    MessageReplicator.Writer
    Interface called by the group leader for proposing messages.
    Replicator
    Defines common features available to all types of replicators.
    ReplicatorConfig
    Configuration options used when opening a replicator.
    Role
    Supported membership roles.
    SnapshotReceiver
    Receiver-side object for controlling the transmission of a database snapshot to a new group member.
    SnapshotSender
    Sender-side object for controlling the transmission of a database snapshot to a new group member.
    StreamReplicator
    Low-level replication interface, which recives messages in a non-delineated stream.
    StreamReplicator.Reader
    Interface called by any group member for reading committed messages.
    StreamReplicator.Writer
    Interface called by the group leader for proposing messages.
